articles.description: As Barcelona celebrate winning La Liga, Spanish football expert Guillem Balague looks at how manager Hansi Flick turned his young side into champions.
articles.title: Barcelona win La Liga title: How Hansi Flick turned Lamine Yamal & co into champions

articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary from day one of the PGA Championship at the Quail Hollow Club in Charlotte, North Carolina.
articles.title: US PGA Championship LIVE: Day 1 leaderboard, tee-times, scores, radio & updates from Quail Hollow

articles.description: Thirteen people are injured when a car crashed into fans outside the Espanyol-Barcelona derby match on Thursday night.
articles.title: Espanyol v Barcelona: Thirteen injured after car crashes into crowd

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo tops the Forbes list of highest-paid athletes for the third consecutive year, while NBA star Stephen Curry moves up to second.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: Portugal forward tops Forbes highest-paid athlete list in 2025

articles.description: Marcus Rashford believes Manchester United would be prepared to sell him for £40m to anyone, not just Aston Villa.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Forward believes Manchester United would be prepared to sell him for £40m

articles.description: American Ryan Gerard leads the US PGA Championship from Europe's Ryder Cup captain Luke Donald while Rory McIlroy endures a tough start on day one at Quail Hollow.
articles.title: US PGA Championship first round: Rory McIlroy struggles and Luke Donald starts well as Ryan Gerard leads on day one

articles.description: Uefa accuses Fifa president Gianni Infantino of prioritising "private political interests" after he turned up late for the world football governing body's congress in Paraguay.
articles.title: Gianni Infantino: Uefa accuses Fifa president over 'private political interests' and stages congress walk-out

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe and his former club Paris St-Germain are embroiled in a legal dispute, but a verdict will soon be reached.
articles.title: Why are PSG and Kylian Mbappe facing each other in court?

articles.description: George Russell says the back-and-forth controversy over punishing Formula 1 drivers for swearing is "all a bit suspect".
articles.title: George Russell: Mercedes driver says F1 swearing controversy 'a bit suspect'

articles.description: Liverpool are ready to trigger Bayer Leverkusen star Jeremie Frimpong's release clause as they close in on their first signing of the summer.
articles.title: Jeremie Frimpong: Liverpool ready to trigger Bayer Leverkusen star's release clause
